head.title: COVID-19 Resource Page - Lindenwold District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Annual Audit, Budget and Contract Information
a.span: Annual Audit, Budget and Contract Information

li.a: Annual Audit, Budget and Contract Information

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: medium; letter-spacing: 0.3px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: I know that all of you are concerned about how the current outbreak of the 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) will impact your community and our schools. District officials have been staying abreast of the information coming out from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the NJ and Camden County Health Departments, the Governor’s Office and the NJ Department of Education regarding guidance for schools. We will use our website, to share important information with you as it evolves. Thank you for your understanding as we navigate these uncharted waters.
